channel.title: Code to change floor plz
channel.description: ok well i am making a mod city with fedexers object spawning code for testing purposes right now. I need to figure out how to change the ground color so i can make it gray in a certain spot. i dont want to replace the entire grassland with cement so i was wondering if there is a way to change this. if there is a code so i can change the tile then that would help. right now im stuck with black ground...

item.title: Code to change floor plz

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

hmm well i was wondering if i could edit the square i got now. its black but i could probably edit to whatever i want but i dont know how to edit them so help with that then
